locations.name: Arambol Beach
locations.description: Known for its thrilling skydiving experience with scenic views of the Arabian Sea.

locations.name: Bangalore
locations.description: Famous for its aerial views of the city and surrounding countryside.

locations.name: Pondicherry
locations.description: Enjoy skydiving with spectacular coastal views.

locations.name: Kullu Valley
locations.description: Skydiving amidst the stunning snow-capped mountains and valleys.

locations.name: Nashik
locations.description: A place to enjoy an aerial view of the vineyards and surrounding hills.

locations.name: Rishikesh
locations.description: Known for adventure activities, including the thrilling skydiving experience over the Ganges.

locations.name: Delhi
locations.description: A great location for an urban skydiving experience over the capital city.

locations.name: Dhana, Madhya Pradesh
locations.description: An offbeat destination for skydiving with panoramic views of the surrounding landscape.

locations.name: Bhopal
locations.description: A thrilling skydiving experience above the city of lakes.

locations.name: Jaipur
locations.description: Enjoy skydiving with an aerial view of the beautiful Pink City.
